Header: Mother and daughter dies in three-wheeler accident
Content: COLOMBO (News 1st) â€“ A mother and a daughter died in an accident that occurred in Meddegama, Kirindiwela when the three-wheeler they were on veered off the road as a result of the driver falling asleep. The mother and the child who sustained severe injuries had passed away as they were being admitted to Radawana hospital. The victims aged 7 and 37 years of age and are residents of Maddegama, Kirindiwela. The bodies of the deceased have been kept in the Wathuptiwala hospital for the post-mortem. The Police stated that the three-wheeler driver has been arrested over the incident.
